My Public Brain

The publicly visible notes from my knowledge management system

Jots

Knowledge management for my particular ADHD brain is less careful notes of topics learned and more tracking what I was doing five minutes ago. Sometimes I can extract long-term value from that, though.

Currently writing notes in Logseq

Currently building it with Eleventy

Fediverse thread about my train of thought while exploring this idea

GitHub - brianwisti/logseq-eleventy: Trying one way to publish a Logseq graph with Eleventy

Notes written in Logseq and published with Eleventy.
